basics.name: Dylan Swoope
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am an experienced sawyer, practiced Kung Fu for several years, and regularly cut my own hair.

highlights: Collected surface water data and prepared relevant reports using established USGS methods
Processed records in USGS database to ensure ongoing accuracy of data displayed on public websites
Resolved gaps in historical records by interpolating data based on hydrologic trends
Provided assistance to partner organizations and river authorities with fieldwork & data management
Deployed as member of regionally organized teams on 14-day fire assignments in remote locations
Maintained proficiency in fire engine operation, fire suppression tactics, and wilderness first aid skills
Supervised and instructed crew of up to 10 and groups of volunteers of up to 30
Reviewed and revised scope of work for potential contracts and created timeline for project work
Oversaw project completion, ensured specific client standards and specifications were met, simultaneously maintained safety of the crew

projects.name: Texans.vote
projects.summary: A social media contest platform aimed at encouraging civic engagement and increasing voter turnout.

projects.name: Health Inspector
projects.summary: A web app that retrieves restaurant health inspection scores from the City of Austin data portal
